titleStmt.title: 1) Commentary by Mathuranātha of Tattvacintāmaṇi Anumānakhaṇḍa 2) Cintāmaṇi

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is a collection of two works. Both works are Nyāya texts. The first text is a commentary of Mathuranātha Tarkavagīśa and second text is of Tattvacintāmaṇi of Gaṅgeśa upādhyāya. 5 folio of the second text, Tattvacintāmaṇi are missing. The front guard folio has title of only first text- mūla madhurānāthiyyaṃ vyāptivādaḥ. Palm leaf is used as a guard folio. 37 number written in pink chalk on the right side. Right margin is broken. Spots of black fungus on the upper margin and wormhole.

msItem.title: Rahasyaṭīkā
msItem.author: Mathurānātha tharkavāgīśa
msItem.rubric: (t55-1v 1) ajñānatimirāndhansya jñānānjalaśalākayā cakṣurunmilitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ | oṃ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ | oṃ śrīmate [vakubābharaṇāya?] namaḥ oṃ (lacuna aprroximately 2 letters) (t55-1v 2) te paravaramunaye namaḥ |
msItem.incipit: (t55-1v 2) nyāyāṃbudhikṛtasetuhetuṃ śrīrāmamakhilasaṃpatteḥ tātaṃ tribhuvanagītaṃ tarkkālaṃkāramādarānnatvā śrīmatā mathurārānāthatarkka (t55-1v 3) vāgīśadhīmatā visadīkṛtya dṛśyate dvitīyamaṇiphakkikā | pratyākṣaṃ nirupitamidānīmanumānannirupaṇīyyamataśśiṣyāvadhānāya pratijānīte|
msItem.explicit: (t55-68r 1) sambandhena tayorapi sādhyavyabhicārānumāpakatvāditibhāvaḥ aprayojakasādhyavyāpakavyabhicāriṇoḥ aprayojakatvasādhyavyāpakavyabhicāritvayorityarthaḥ iti ke (t55-68r 2) cit na svavyabhicāritvena sādhyavyabhicārānumāpatvameva tathāstu aprayojakatvādikantu na tatheti vācyaṃ yogārthāpekṣay(ai)[ā] tasya gurutvāditi dik ..
msItem.finalRubric: (t55-68r 2) anumānapari (t55-68r 3) cchede vyāptivādarahasyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ .. hariḥ oṃ

msItem.title: Tattvacintāmaṇi
msItem.author: Gaṅgeśa Upādhyāya
msItem.incipit: (t56- 1v 1) pratyakṣopajīvyatvāt pratyakṣānantaraṃ bahuvidasammatatvādupamānāt prāganumānam nirupyate tatra vyāprtiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānajanya anu (t56- 1v 2) mitiḥ .

support.p: Palm leaf is used as a guard folio. 37 number written in pink chalk on the right side. Right margin is broken. Spots of black fungus on the upper margin and wormhole.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin of the verso of the folio. Separate numeration for each text. t55-1- 68 t56- 1, t56- 6-10 (gap of 4 folio 2-5)

handNote.desc: Well written. Some times instead of sign of 'u' for ukāra the vowel u is written.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on folio t55-1v. Same is written in the left margin on folio t56-1v.
On t55-1v in the left margin the title is mentioned Mathurānādiyyaṃ. On t56-1v in the left margin the title is mentioned Cintāmaṇi.

listBibl.bibl: The Tattva Chintamani of Gangesh Upadhyaya Part II Anumana Khanda from Anumiti to Badha From the commentaries of Mathuranath Tarkavagisha edited by Pandit Kamakhyanath Tarkavagisha , Bibliotheca Indica collection of Oriental works published by The Asiatic Society of Bengal, Calcutta, 1892

encodingDesc.p: Spapces are added to saperate words. Some doubful words are put in the sqare bracket with questionmark. Only question mark is used to show the illegible letter.

TEI.text:
(t55-1v 1) ajñānatimirāndhansya jñānānjalaśalākayā cakṣurunmilitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ | oṃ śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ | oṃ śrīmate [vakubābharaṇāya?] namaḥ oṃ (lacuna aprroximately 2 letters) (t55-1v 2) te paravaramunaye namaḥ | nyāyāṃbudhikṛtasetuhetuṃ śrīrāmamakhilasaṃpatteḥ tātaṃ tribhuvanagītaṃ tarkkālaṃkāramādarānnatvā śrīmatā mathurārānāthatarkka (t55-1v 3) vāgīśadhīmatā visadīkṛtya dṛśyate dvitīyamaṇiphakkikā | pratyākṣaṃ nirupitamidānīmanumānannirupaṇīyyamataśśiṣyāvadhānāya pratijānīte|
(t55-68r 1) sambandhena tayorapi sādhyavyabhicārānumāpakatvāditibhāvaḥ aprayojakasādhyavyāpakavyabhicāriṇoḥ aprayojakatvasādhyavyāpakavyabhicāritvayorityarthaḥ iti ke (t55-68r 2) cit na svavyabhicāritvena sādhyavyabhicārānumāpatvameva tathāstu aprayojakatvādikantu na tatheti vācyaṃ yogārthāpekṣay(ai)[ā] tasya gurutvāditi dik ..
anumānapari (t55-68r 3) cchede vyāptivādarahasyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ|| hariḥ oṃ |

(t56- 1v 1) pratyakṣopajīvyatvāt pratyakṣānantaraṃ bahuvidasammatatvādupamānāt prāganumānam nirupyate tatra vyāprtiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānajanya anu (t56- 1v 2) mitiḥ .
(t56- 1v 7) nanu anumitihetubhutavyāptijane kā vyāptiḥ na tāvadavyabhicaritatvaṃ tatdhi na sādhyānyatābhāvavadavṛttitvaṃ sādhyavat hi ? śādhyānya (gap- folio2-5 are missing.) (t56- 6r 1) ntābhāvavadavṛttitvaṃ sādhyavat pratiyogīkānyonyābhāvāt (t56- 10r 4) yītvaṃ aprayojakasādyavyāpakaṃ vyabhicāriṇe ?vyupādhitāpatteḥ iti cintāmaṇau vyāptivādassamāptaḥ |
